description:
As the weather turns chilly, Sosuke introduces Sara to a special wintertime treat. Then they`re off on case that`s going to take them in circles and give them a run for their money, you could say.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hime to Kotatsu / Isekaijin no Koseki Mondai / Hime to Uma
The Princess and the Kotatsu / The Girl from Another World and Family Register Issues / The Princess and Horses
姫とこたつ / 異世界人の戸籍問題 / 姫と馬
